verses.roman:
antaryāmi-upāsaka 'ātmārāma' kaya
sei ātmārāma yogīra dui bheda haya

synonyms: antaryāmi—of the Supersoul; upāsaka—worshiper; ātmārāma kaya—is also said to be an ātmārāma; sei ātmārāma—that ātmārāma; yogīra—of the mystic yogī; dui bheda haya—there are two kinds.
translation: "The yogī who worships the Supersoul within himself is also called ātmārāma. There are two types of ātmārāma-yogīs.
